description: Without knowledge, powerful photo editing software like Pixelmator is about as much use as an airplane that you don't know how to fly. Well here's 8+ hours of photo enhancement lessons from someone with over 25 years experience as a designer! Learn techniques you'll find in photography studios the world over to polish your photos. Use the same techniques Photoshoppers use, along with good practices and a few gotchas to avoid. Then we'll process a batch of photos and put those principles into practice, so that you leave the course with the knowledge you need to really make your photos shine!
title: Pixelmator: Solid Foundations
